data.text: @IanSams LOL! Oh yes, that assessment about how some lives are completely expendable 'for the economy'. PLEASE.
@IanSams So you simply moved the goalposts, is what you're saying. https://t.co/a9NjwaYR6h
@IanSams This abandons a lot of very at risk people and communities in this country.

How did CDC determine these metrics? 

Through a months-long rigorous assessment analyzing historical data from past surges, and modeling impact of various metrics.

Read about that scientific process here: https://t.co/pvprYyYzT9
@IanSams This is a horrible move. A thread: https://t.co/jwCdDBHxDZ
